titleInfo.title: Letter from Persian and Armenian merchants to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from eighteen Persian merchants and four Armenian merchants requesting assistance in transferring treasure to India, which has become too dangerous due to pirate activity, and stating that they would like to use the ship HMS Favoriteto do so. The letter goes on to assure Bruce of their loyalty to the British government.The letter is signed by the following individuals:Hajee Aga DehdarhtyAbdolla HamadoonyAhmed ben Hajer Mohomed ShirazyMohomed Ruza ShirazyAbdol Karim ShoosteryHajee Essmail KazroonySaid Mohsand ibn Mirza Mohomed HossainMen Jullaul EsphanyHaussan Aly KazroonyMohomed bin ShuraffHossain ibn Hajir AzeezAga Mohomed KaresnsMohomed Gooloon HossainAga JaffarMohamed Aly bin Hajer Meerza Abdol KanyMohomed Aly bin EssmailMohomed KhorasoonyMohomed Hossain bin Hajir RahimA A ConstantineArrathoon MalcolmMichial Tu StaphinCatchatoor JohannessThe letter is undated but is most likely from April to June 1816 as the letter immediately preceding it is dated 26 April 1816 and the letter immediately following it is dated 20 June 1816.
